title: Essential Work Begins at Home
sub_head: My tradesmen are like family—and usually with less baggage.
body:
The Babylonian Talmud advises: “Make for yourself a teacher, acquire for yourself a friend, and judge every person on the positive side.” I’d add: Make for yourself an electrician, acquire for yourself a plumber, and judge the body man’s work on your fender on the positive side.
After 2½ years of Covid, much of it spent sitting around the house, the whole country has noticed things that need to be fixed and rooms that need redecorating. The wait for materials is long and good people to do work are scarce.
